title: PPPP’s Sardar Abid wins PS-5 election
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 9 (APP): Pakistan Peoples Party Parliamentarians’ (PPPP) Sardar Ghulam Abid has won the Sindh Assembly election from PS-5 Kashmore-II by securing 31,132 votes.
According to the unofficial result issued by the Returning Officer/ECP, his runner-up was Rabnawaz of Jamiat Ulema-i-Islam Pakistan (JUI-P) who bagged 21,052 votes.
Overall voters’ turn-out remained 35.15 per cent.
